doc:
Edward Clark (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Clark_(actor) 0 Edward Clark (May 6, 1878 – November 18, 1954) was a Russian-born American actor whose career began in the silent era. He appeared in 133 films between 1913 and 1955. He was also a playwright, theatre director and songwriter. Among his songs was the original 1899 barbershop quartet song Heart of My Heart. He was born in Russia and died in Hollywood, California from a heart attack. Edward_Clark ( May_6_,_1878 – November_18_,_1954 ) was a_Russian-born_American_actor whose_career began in the_silent_era . He appeared in 133_films between 1913_and_1955 . He was also a_playwright , theatre_director_and_songwriter . Among his_songs was the_original_1899_barbershop_quartet_song Heart of My_Heart . He was_born in Russia and died in Hollywood , California from a_heart_attack .
